line.text: Those hours that with gentle work did frame
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The lovely gaze where every eye doth dwell
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Will play the tyrants to the very same
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And that unfair which fairly doth excel
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For never-resting time leads summer on
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To hideous winter and confounds him there
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Sap checked with frost and lusty leaves quite gone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Beauty oer-snowed and bareness every where
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then were not summer distillation left
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: A liquid prisoner pent in walls of glass
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Beauty effect with beauty were bereft
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Nor it nor no remembrance what it was
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But flowers distilled though they with winter meet
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Leese but their show their substance still lives sweet
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
